definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: An expressing vector of major outer-membrane protein of Chlamydia psittaci was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 主要外膜蛋白在鹦鹉热衣原体感染过程中起主要作用。

sentences.english: But there is no evidence of the relationship with Chlamydia psittaci infection and of the ocular adnexal lymphomas stage and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 暂未发现鹦鹉热衣原体感染和疾病的分期及预后有关。

sentences.english: In addition, the bird-borne diseases also gives psittaci.
sentences.chinese: 另外，鸟传染给人的疾病还有鹦鹉热。

sentences.english: Parakeets, parrots, and pigeons may spread psittacosis, a disease similar to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 鹦鹉和鸽子可传染鹦鹉热，一种类似肺炎的疾病。

sentences.english: Major outer membrane protein plays a key role in the infection of Chlamydia psittaci.
sentences.chinese: 主要外膜蛋白在鹦鹉热衣原体感染过程中起主要作用。

pinyin: di4 fang1 xing4 ban1 zhen3 shang1 han2
gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4

definition: Giardiasis, a form of gastro-enteritis caused by infection of gut by Giardia lamblia protozoan parasite

pinyin: zu3 zhi1 bao1 jiang1 jun1 bing4

definition: epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis
